content.rendered:
On the 31st of August, Prestige Motorcars had the honour of unveiling the Tesla Model 3 to the Indonesian market. The launch took place at Pacific Place mall and was attended by a numerous different media channels as well as distinguished VIP guests.

Apart from the unveiling itself, we also provided a Test Drive service for people who were curious about experiencing a Tesla for the first time. 

It’s time for Indonesia to embrace the coming of electric vehicles and we’re happy to be part of the steps in taking it there.
